item.title: Picasa Photo Gallery in PHP
item.author: Nathan Petersen
item.description: Background My earliest memories involve taking and cherishing family photos. Most of the photos I have and remember are stored in physical picture albums around my house. Since I was young, I can remember the process of my parents taking lots of pictures, developing the film, and organizing them into a multitude of albums and scrapbooks to save for memories. This system worked great for them and their parents, but I immediately saw flaws.
